resources.string: If answer is infinity write \"infinity\", if answer is -infinity write \"-infinity\". Without quotation mark.
1. What is the derivative of f where f(x) = cos(x)?
2. What is the area bounded by functions f(x) = e^x, g(x) = x^2 and by curves x = 2, x = 5? Write the answer with two decimal place.
3. Check all functions differentiable in x = 0.
4. Which statement is true? Check all that applies.
5. What is the limit of sequence a_n = n*sin(2/n) when n goes to infinity?
6. Check all functions continuous in x = 0.
7. Which statement is true? Check all that applies.
8. What is the limit of function f(x) = ln(x) when x goes to zero from right side?
9. Which equation is true? Check all that applies.
10. Which number series is convergent? Check all that applies. Below is given formula for nth index of sequence of the series.
If function f is continuous in x then f is differentiable in x
If function f is differentiable in x then f is continuous in x
If limit of sequence equals 0 then series of this sequence is convergent.
If series is convergent then limit of sequence of this series is 0.
